name: Sms-based-information-retrieval-system
body:
# Project Description
Usually we don't know where our classes our and if in case we know we don't have the study material ready with us.
This Project was created so that students never miss their class again and get the desired material with just a mail.

# Features
 * After subscribing , the person get a short message service fifteen minutes before the actual class timing with all the     relevant details.
 * Easy access of study material, by simply sending a mail with relevant information.

# Technology/Tools
 * Xampp
 * php 
 * mySql
 * Natural Language processing
 * Cron Jobs
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
